**Dazzling Flash** is a Level 3 [Conjurations](/Conjurations "Conjurations")/[Hexes](/Hexes "Hexes") spell that attempts to [blind](/Blind "Blind") all monsters within range.

[Enchanters](/Enchanter "Enchanter") start with this spell available.

## Effect

When Dazzling Flash is cast, all vulnerable creatures within range and [LOS](/LOS "LOS") may be blinded for 4 to 8 turns, with the chance of success increasing with [spell power](/Spell_power "Spell power") and decreasing with monster [hit dice](/Hit_dice "Hit dice"). At full power, the odds are `95% - (4 * HD)`.

Dazzling Flash has no effect on the [undead](/Undead "Undead"), [nonliving](/Nonliving "Nonliving"), or [plants](/Plants "Plants"). Additionally, some creatures with powerful senses (or no eyes!) are immune to blinding, such as [wolves](/Wolf "Wolf") and [jellies](/Jelly "Jelly").

## Strategy

While useful to anyone as an occasional escape spell or to slow down a crowd while you whittle it down to size, [stabbers](/Stabbing "Stabbing") benefit the most, as this spell ignores both [willpower](/Willpower "Willpower") and [see invisible](/See_invisible "See invisible"). Its effectiveness tapers off toward the endgame, where more monsters are immune or have high HD. For single targets, [Confusing Touch](/Confusing_Touch "Confusing Touch") lasts much longer and has multiple chances to hex per cast.

## History

- In [0.32](/0.32 "0.32"), Dazzling Flash will be a [Fire](/Fire "Fire")/[Hexes](/Hexes "Hexes") spell.
- Prior to [0.31](/0.31 "0.31"), [Conjurers](/Conjurer "Conjurer") also started with Dazzling Flash.
- Dazzling Flash was added in [0.25](/0.25 "0.25"), replacing [Dazzling Spray](/Dazzling_Spray "Dazzling Spray").
